PageWidgetPortable.Title: Terceiros
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <CanDelete>true</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>true</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>GN_PESSOAS.PORTALFORNECEDORTERCEIROS.GRID</EntityViewName> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>1</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>A.HANDLE IN (SELECT TERCEIRO FROM GN_FORNECEDORESTERCEIROS WHERE FORNECEDOR IN (SELECT PESSOA FROM Z_GRUPOUSUARIOS WHERE HANDLE = @USUARIO) AND DATAINICIO<=@HOJE AND @TROCARNULO(DATATERMINO,@HOJE)>=@HOJE) </UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/aga/a/genericos/fornecedores/Terceiro.aspx</FormUrl> <ShowExport>true</ShowExport> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>
